mapper.select: select * from f_feed inner join f_profile on f_feed.mem_num = f_profile.mem_num inner join f_member on f_feed.mem_num = f_member.mem_num inner join f_friend on f_feed.mem_num = f_friend.friend_num where f_friend.mem_num = #{value} and f_friend.friend_accept = 'follow' order by f_feed.feed_regdate desc
select * from f_feed order by feed_num desc where feed_open='temp'
mapper.insert: insert into f_feed values(#{feed_num}, #{mem_num}, #{bp_num}, #{feed_content}, #{feed_img1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feed_img2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feed_img3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feed_img4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, 0, sysdate, #{feed_open}, default)

insert into f_feed (feed_num, mem_num, feed_content, feed_img1, feed_img2, feed_img3, feed_img4, feed_like, feed_report, feed_regdate, feed_open, feed_hide) values(#{feed_num}, #{mem_num}, #{feed_content}, #{feed_img1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feed_img2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feed_img3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feed_img4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, 0, sysdate, #{feed_open}, default)
mapper.update: update f_feed set bp_num=#{bp_num}, feed_content=#{feed_content}, feed_img1=#{feed_img1}, feed_img2=#{feed_img2}, feed_img3=#{feed_img3}, feed_img4=#{feed_img4}, feed_open=#{feed_open} where feed_num=#{feed_num}
update f_feed set feed_report=#{feed_report} where feed_num=#{feed_num}
update f_feed set feed_like=feed_like+1 where feed_num=#{feed_num}
update f_feed set feed_like=feed_like-1 where feed_num=#{feed_num}
mapper.select: select theme_name f_feed_theme inner join f_theme on f_feed_theme.theme_num = f_theme.theme_num where feed_num = #{feed_num}
